item.title: MLflow 3.9.0 Highlights: AI Assistant, Dashboards, and Judge Optimization
item.description: MLflow 3.9.0 is a major release focused on AI Observability and Evaluation capabilities, bringing powerful new features for building, monitoring, and optimizing AI agents. This release introduces an AI-powered assistant, comprehensive dashboards for agent performance, a new judge optimization algorithm, judge builder UI, continuous monitoring with LLM judges, and distributed tracing.

item.title: MLflow 3
item.description: The open source MLflow community has reached a major milestone. Today, we're releasing MLflow 3, which brings production-ready generative AI capabilities to the platform that millions of developers trust for ML operations.
